title: Shiguang Guiyu
synopsis: On his wedding day, Shi Xiaoguang could only helplessly watch as a mysterious power took his bride Xiaqing, away. Afterwards, he found that no one remembered the existence of “Xiaqing” and he is hunted by this unclear force. Faced with this situation, Shi Xiaoguang slowly began understanding that the world as he knew it had changed.

title: Sengoku Choujuu Giga: Kou
synopsis: The history, either daily life or life stories of Sengoku warriors, is described using animals. We invite popular young actors and unique casts to voice out those Sengoku warriors while joking about them. An anime that teases Japan's history and Sengoku warriors; that's "Sengoku Choujuu Giga." (Source: MAL News)

title: Macross Δ: Delta Shougekijou
synopsis: Short episodes included in the limited edition BD/DVD volume releases.

details.Japanese: マクロスΔ「でるた小劇場」

title: Girlfriend (Note)
synopsis: One day, after the ending of World Dance Battle Royale, it has been unexpectedly decided that the nonet will work together with "Ootori" members from Ootoriutain High School to create a drama. The drama is an original story based on Cinderella with an arrangement. It has been decided that Momoko Asahina will play Cinderella and Miyabi Kunishiro the prince. Also, an unexpected role has been decided for Kokomi Shiina. A drama between a slightly different nonet and Ootori members has begun. (Sourc: MAL News)

title: Teekyuu 8
synopsis: Eighth season of the Teekyuu anime series.

title: Ao Oni The Animation
synopsis: In most ordinary high schools, many stories and rumors float around—some scandalous, some happy and some...more macabre. One such example is of monsters lurking in an abandoned mansion outside of town. Such tales, however, prove too tempting to resist for Hiroshi and his friends Mika, Takeshi, and Takurou. They decide to brave the rumored dangers in order to investigate the manor and complete a test of courage. Each of them approaches the mansion with an overwhelming sense of dread. And when they enter, they come upon a blue monster named Ao Oni who attacks them. As Hiroshi and his friends try to solve the various puzzles in the mansion and escape their new blue nemesis, they find themselves meeting several horrible endings as they fail miserably.

details.Japanese: あおおに ～じ・あにめぇしょん～

title: Amanchu!: Yakusoku no Natsu to Atarashii Omoide no Koto
synopsis: An unaired episode bundled with the seventh Blu-ray volume of the  Amanchu! anime series.

details.Japanese: あまんちゅ！約束の夏と新しい思い出のコト

title: Ao Oni The Animation (Movie)
synopsis: An animated film series based on the Ao Oni game. It will feature a new story.

title: Tokyo Dai Kuushuu: Aoyo, Kaette Koi
synopsis: A stop-motion puppet animation about the Operation Meetinghouse air raid on Tokyo which caused over 100,000 deaths.

details.Japanese: 東京大空襲 あおよかえってこい

title: Ten ni Yaka Reru: E ni Yoru Shougen
synopsis: A documentary style anime about the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima.

details.Japanese: 天に焼かれる ～絵による証言～

title: Genbaku Dome Monogatari
synopsis: An educational film about the A-Bomb Dome, which is currently a UNESCO World Heritage Site as a Hiroshima Peace Memorial.

title: Satoukibibatake
synopsis: An educational film about the Sugarcane Field song composed by Naohiko Terashima in honor of the fallen soldiers at the Battle of Okinawa. The song is a ballad focusing on a girl who does not know her father has died in battle and goes to search for him in the sugarcane fields wondering why people go to war and if it was all worth the risk.

title: Neko no Kuni no Kenpou
synopsis: An educational film about the formation of the Constitution of Japan simplified extremely under the guise of a country of cats meant for a young audience.

title: Gakushuu Animation Nihon Koku Kenpou
synopsis: An educational film about the formation of the Constitution of Japan.

details.Japanese: 学習アニメーション日本国憲法

title: Yume Kakeru Kougen: Kiyosato no Chichi Paul Rusch
synopsis: An animated film about Paul Rusch, an American missionary who helped build churches, schools, hospitals in Japan and overall helped improve life in rural areas of Japan along with soothing post-WW2 relations between the two countries.

details.English: Paul Rusch: His Life and Dream
details.Japanese: 夢かける高原 清里の父 ポール・ラッシュ

title: Chii-chan no Kageokuri
synopsis: A war film about Chii-chan who played a shadow game with her family where you stare at your shadow for 10 seconds and move away quickly causes an afterimage to stay. During an air raid Chii-chan gets separated from her family. She plays the shadow game and finds her family joining in...

details.Japanese: ちいちゃんのかげおくり

title: Sin: Nanatsu no Taizai
synopsis: Lucifer, an Archangel and former head of the Seven Heavenly Virtues, is banished from Heaven after revolting against the Lord's will.. While plummeting from the skies, she is halted halfway between Heaven and Hell after crashing through the roof of a high school church. Though she is witnessed by Maria Totsuka, a soft-spoken student at the academy, Lucifer swiftly continues her descent into the depths of Hell. Soon after her arrival, Lucifer is found by aspiring Demon Lord and fangirl Leviathan. The two decide to overthrow the Seven Sins, the authorities of Hell under the leadership of Belial. But with their combined powers, the Seven Sins are able to repel Lucifer and contain her divine powers by placing a Garb of Punishment over her body, transforming Lucifer into a Demon Lord.  Longing for revenge and accompanied by Leviathan, Lucifer makes her way back to Earth, where she forces Maria to become her immortal slave. Together with her new accomplices, Lucifer sets out on a mission to subdue the Seven Sins so she may be free of the curse brought upon by her Garb.

title: PJ Berri no Mogumogu Munyamunya
synopsis: Fuji TV announced that it will air a new series of anime shorts based on the Parappa the Rapper video game franchise. The new anime will center on the P.J. Berri character. Each episode is about 96 seconds long. The anime celebrates both the 20th anniversary of the game and the 15th anniversary of the anime series. (Source: US Anime Direct, edited)

details.Synonyms: PJ Berry no Mogu Mogu Munya Munya
details.Japanese: PJベリーのもぐもぐむにゃむにゃ

title: Seiren
synopsis: For high school students like Shouichi Kamita, university entrance exams and the future are common concerns. It is also during this time in life that a mysterious emotion that vexes people of all ages may begin to weigh upon one's mind—love. At this point in his teenage years, Shouichi finds three girls he could see himself having a future with: the ever-cheerful Hikari Tsuneki, who teases Shouichi without mercy, but actually has a softer side; the competitive gamer, Tooru Miyamae, who has difficulty communicating with others; and Shouichi's childhood friend, Kyouko Touno, the sometimes immature shoujo manga enthusiast. Seiren follows Shouichi's relationships with these three girls across three separate arcs, as their feelings grow from mutual interest and blossom into something more beautiful.

title: Alice in Deadly School
synopsis: The story begins with the peaceful daily life of schoolgirls—which suddenly breaks down when former schoolmates become zombies. The story follows the actions taken by the girls left behind on the school roof. (Source: ANN) A short special edit of the OVA, titled Alice in Deadly School Tokubetsu-ban: Ima, Stage no Maku ga Agaru (Alice in Deadly School Special Edit -The Stage Begins-), was broadcasted on January 4, 2021 as part of the New Year's special.

details.Japanese: アリスインデッドリースクール

title: Kabuki-bu!
synopsis: Kurogu had a love of kabuki theater instilled in him from a very young age thanks to his grandfather. Now, as a high school student, he desires to create his own kabuki club in order to bring an appreciation of kabuki to a wider audience. He'll find, though, that with the weight of hundreds of years of strict tradition, it's not so easy to get high schoolers interested. A rough start is not enough to deter Kurogu, and he'll work hard to inspire in others the same burning passion he feels, until the day he can put on his own performance! (Source: Honey's Anime)

title: Fushigi no Yappo Shima: Pukipuki to Poi
synopsis: A stop-motion animation with felt characters on a small island floating in the sea.

details.Japanese: ふしぎのヤッポ島 プキプキとポイ

title: Matsubara-kun: Mackie E no Ouen Message
synopsis: Matsubara-kun gives his support to Mackie, a fellow Matsubara city mascot, for the 2015 yuru-chara grand prix.

details.Japanese: まつばらくん　「マッキーへの応援メッセージ」

title: Free! Movie 1: Timeless Medley - Kizuna
synopsis: Haruka Nanase has reconciled with his rival Rin Matsuoka, and they have re-established their friendship, determined to race each other again. Now Haruka, along with Makoto Tachibana, Rei Ryuugazaki, and Nagisa Hazuki, prepare for their upcoming tournaments, determined to compete wholeheartedly and achieve victory as a team. At Samezuka Academy, Rin resolves to do the same. Further, the seniors near graduation, and Rin has decided his future plans. However, Haruka and Makoto remain uncertain, and they begin to feel the pressure of having to choose their own paths.

details.Japanese: 劇場版 Free!-Timeless Medley- 絆

title: Garo: Guren no Tsuki - Yurugaro
synopsis: Omake specials that feature the cast of Garo: Guren no Tsuki.
background:
The specials aired on the Family Gekijo cable channel directly after episodes of Garo: Guren no Tsuki, starting on January 30, 2016. Yurugaro was aired after episodes 14 and 16 through 21.

The first special was uploaded on YouTube on June 30, 2016 to celebrate the launch of the TV series' DVD/BD release. Yurugaro was included in the second Garo: Guren no Tsuki DVD/BD box set, released July 6, 2016.

details.Synonyms: Garo: Guren no Tsuki Omake, Garo: Crimson Moon Specials

title: Nekoronde ID
synopsis: TV Station IDs for Nekoronde. They feature the cats jumping into the actual TV and being a part of the program. Since the official site does not say when each one aired, their air date is listed as the upload day to the official youtube channel.

title: Nil Admirari no Tenbin
synopsis: The Taishou era didn't end in 15 years, but went on for another 25. In order to protect her waning family, a girl resolves to marry a man she doesn't even know the name of. However, just before the marriage was to take place, the girl's younger brother mysteriously committed suicide by self-immolation and was found holding an old book in his hands. Appearing before the bewildered young girl was the "Imperial Library Intelligence Asset Management Bureau," more commonly referred to as "Fukurou." According to these men, there exists "Maremono," which are books that greatly affect their readers. On top of that, ever since the incident involving the girl's younger brother, she unwittingly gains the ability to see "Auras" (the sentiments of the Maremono which manifest as bright lights and are usually invisible to humans). It was as though fate were trying to drag the young girl in its flames. And then, even though apprehensive, the girl chooses to venture outside her bird cage. Jealousy, hatred, scorn, compassion, and love. What awaited the girl was the darkness of betrayal that had already begun to bewitchingly inlay the imperial capital. Toyed by and swayed within that darkness, will the young girl finally reach the truth after her struggles, or...? (Source: MAL News)

details.Synonyms: The Scales of Nil Admirari ~The Mysterious Story of Teito~
details.Japanese: ニル・アドミラリの天秤

title: Mekakucity Reload
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: KoSys! Lite
synopsis: The series focuses on the staff of the Keihime Railway Company.

title: Show By Rock!! x Joysound
synopsis: A series of cross-promotional shorts with Joysound featuring Show By Rock characters.

title: Saitama-ken Zaijuu, Fujiyama Osamu, 33-sai, Mushoku (NEET).: Fujilog Nyuumon-hen
synopsis: The original Fujilog ONA series before making it big with a TV series.

details.Japanese: 埼玉県在住、フジヤマオサム、33歳、無職(ニート)。～フジログ入門編～

title: Saitama-ken Zaijuu, Fujiyama Osamu, 33-sai, Mushoku (NEET).: Fujilog Nyuumon-hen Specials
synopsis: DVD exclusive episodes, chronologically episode 26-29.

details.Japanese: 埼玉県在住、フジヤマオサム、33歳、無職(ニート)。～フジログ入門編～

title: Kissaten Soudou
synopsis: A customer and cafe owner get into a fight.

title: Chicken Papa
synopsis: A rooster who happens to be a father.

title: Saru Kani Gassen (Yokoku)
synopsis: An adaptation of the classic Japanese folktale albeit a teaser.

title: Nani no Yaku ni Mo Tatanai Karappona Hanashi
synopsis: Animation made for two Makoto Otake Golden Radio bits.

details.Synonyms: An empty story that does not serve any purpose
details.Japanese: 何の役にも立たない空っぽな話

title: Chichi Kaeru
synopsis: A soon-to-be father frog neglects his pregnant wife by going on adulterous affairs.

title: Cakes
synopsis: Sweets having idle chatter.

title: Fujilog (ONA)
synopsis: The first episode is a motion capture of the Fujilog characters with Perfume's song with the raw data provided by the Perfume website. The second episode is smooth/realistic CG animation on top of real life footage; it shows Fujiyama in his OSAM 1-gou that we see in the TV series.

title: 8-shaku 8-wa Kerakumeguri: Igyou Kaikitan The Animation
synopsis: Based on the manga by Jyoka.

details.Japanese: 八尺八話快樂巡り 異形怪奇譚 The Animation

title: Wonder
synopsis: A music video for 1000say's song "Wonder."
background: The video was played at an exclusive live show at the Hokutopia Space Yuu Planetarium Hall on December 22, 2012. The performance and video were later uploaded to 1000say's official YouTube channel on March 17, 2013.

title: Kabi Usagi (2016)
synopsis: Four years after the original Kabi Usagi shorts, a new episode was released. This was longer than the original, contained smoother animation, was fully voiced (unlike the original which has no voice acting), and numbered as "story 01." A series/additional numbered shorts were expected under this franchise revival but it never came to fruition after this first episode.

title: Kabi Usagi
synopsis: Shorts focusing on the cute (albeit bittersweet) lives of several rabbits with mold growing on them. They dream to spread their mold all over the world.

details.Synonyms: Mold Rabbit, Hikouki-hen, Game Center-hen, Kaichuu-hen

title: Estima: Sense of Wonder
synopsis: Promotional shorts for Toyota's Estima (or Previa) car make.
background: Of the 19 episodes created for this project, 13 are animated.

title: Fujinkoron-senpai
synopsis: Short promotional video for the Fujinkoron magazine, starring employees of the editorial department.

title: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo: Maguro no Notta Keikan
synopsis: A Kochikame special that takes place on a fisherman's boat.

details.Japanese: こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所  走れ!両津式チンチン電車〜思い出の大次郎号〜

title: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo: Shiiron Tankentai! Sumidagawa no Chikai - Omoide n
synopsis: The two-part Kochikame special, wherein Ryoutsu helps a zoologist friend capture a real white whale.

synopsis: A two part Kochikame special wherein Ryoutsu becomes involved in a sushi chef's dealings.

details.Synonyms: Kochikame Special 24: Ryou-san no Sushi Kuinee! - Choujyou Maguro Taiket
details.Japanese: こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所 両さんの寿司食いねえ!〜頂上マグロ対決!!〜

title: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo: Washi to Ore!? - Bokura wa Asakusa Shounen Tanteid
synopsis: An amazing time machine invention allows Ryoutsu to return to the years of his childhood.

details.Synonyms: Kochikame Special 25: Washi to Ore!? - Bokura wa Asakusa Shounen Tanteid
details.Japanese: こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所  ワシと俺!?〜ぼくらは浅草少年探偵団!〜

synopsis: A new idol unit is formed to teach people the importance of traffic safety.

details.Synonyms: Kochikame: Mezase! Kameari Superstar!! Ryoutsu-shiki Aidoru h
details.Japanese: こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所 目指せ!亀有スーパースター!!両津式アイドルへの道!

title: Chao You Bing
synopsis: A collection of animation that highlights the Sickness (increasing stupidity) that is plaguing this generation: Chao You Bing

details.Synonyms: Chao You Bing: Zhi Yongzhe Chuanshuo, Chao Youbing

title: Tokyu Plaza Ginza Open
synopsis: A commercial made to advertise the grand opening of the Tokyu Plaza Ginza, a giant indoor shopping mall with restaurants, cafes, boutiques, furiniture, and spas.

title: Hane (2016)
synopsis: Official music video for Koushi Inaba's 5th single Hane. The video features a girl running through a desolate city with occasional cuts to the singer in the studio.

title: Jikkyou Chuukei
synopsis: Official music video for Radwimps' Jikkyou Chuukei song.

title: Time for Christmas
synopsis: Official music video for Glay's Time for Christmas song from the HOpe and The Silver Sunrise album.

title: Omoi Au Christmas 2011
synopsis: A Christmas commercial campaign funded by AFLAC.  2 episodes show the ducks acting like Santa with a song sung by songstress Mayuminu. A 3rd commercial was made combining the previous 2 with extra footage and a song sung by Fukushima Prefectural Asaka Reimei school choir.

title: Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru
synopsis: It is a world replete with dragons and Jushiki sorcerers. Jushiki is a devastatingly powerful formula that can alter the laws of physics, capable of creating enormous TNT explosives or poisonous gas through plasma and nuclear fusion. A down-on-his-luck sorcerer named Gayus joins forces with the beautiful but cruel Jushiki practitioner, Gigina, as bounty hunters pursuing dragons. Then one day, they are presented with an odd request: to serve as security guards for a grand festival put on by Mouldeen, the ruler of their kingdom. It is then that a mysterious serial killing of Jushiki sorcerers begins. (Source: TBS Global Business)

details.Japanese: されど罪人は竜と踊る

title: Sensou: Kodomo-tachi no Yuigon
synopsis: Focuses on children who have become victims of destruction by the air raids. Shown at film festivals and museums.

details.Japanese: 戦争－子どもたちの遺言

title: Kimi Shitteru? Shuto Enjou Anime Tokyo Dai Kuushuu
synopsis: An anime based on the testimony of three survivors of the devastation from the Operation Meetinghouse air raid on Tokyo which caused over 100,000 deaths.

details.Japanese: 君知ってる？首都炎上アニメ東京大空襲

title: Kayoko Sakura no Saku Hi
synopsis: An anime about the real story of 15 year old Kayoko Hayashi. After the Nagasaki atomic bomb, Kayoko's body was found 21 days later crushed under the Shiroyama school building where she had been volunteering for the war effort. 50 cherry tree saplings were donated by her mother (6 of which have survived today) to the Shiroyama elementary school as a memorial to her daughter and to the other children who lost their lives so that people many pray for peace.

title: Utsukushii Chikyuu wo Yogosanai de
synopsis: Nana is a 3rd grader who finds a strange picture book. She's able to jump into the book and be friends with the girl in it as they traveled around the work. She learns about the innocent cries of children all around the world suffering from pollution. The video has some live action segements.

details.Japanese: 美しい地球をよごさないで

title: Torikaekko Please
synopsis: Official music video for Suzukisan's Torikaekko Please song. The song and characters had been used to promote the Pokémon franchise. Nintendo has revived the song for the 20th anniversary campaign.

details.Synonyms: Let's Trade, Please, Pokemon Song, Pokémon Song
details.Japanese: とりかえっこプリーズ

title: IDOLiSH7
synopsis: On her first day of work at her father's small production agency, Tsumugi Takanashi was not expecting to be made the manager of the agency's new male idol group. Though shocked that her father is trusting her with such a major project so soon, Tsumugi vows to do everything she can to support the seven young boys. After seeing how well the boys work as a team, Tsumugi meets with her father and learns that her first job as manager will be to cut four boys from the group. This is because her father believes seven idols are too much to manage, and the current top group, TRIGGER, only has three members. After holding an impromptu audition, Tsumugi returns to her father and boldly declares that she refuses to cut anyone from the group, as each member has a unique allure which collectively enhances the group's appeal. She returns to the boys and they are thrilled that none of them will get to miss out on their dreams. Together they become IDOLiSH7, and prepare to take on the fiercely competitive world of idols.

details.Japanese: アイドリッシュセブン
